ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Kedge
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Excellent! Thanks! This is one of those emails I ll save in my Bard s Archive for future reference. :-)
ygData.messageBody:
At 03:33 PM 1/12/01 -0500, Scott Malin wrote:
>From: "Windleaf Mistsong" <windleaf@...>
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Kedge
>
>
> > You should be able to buy fish scales. There's merchants that sell fish
> > scales and batwings and other spell components. I sure wish I remembered
> > where they were though.
>
>Only 2 places I know of, there's a Female Euridite vendor in EC near the WC
>zone about middle of the zone (north/south middle that is). And I think they
>are also for sale in the Freeport casters guild. The EC vendor is on
>Betaneutral faction it seems, she sells to my DE necro as well as my Woodelf
>bard.

Excellent! Thanks! This is one of those emails I'll save in my Bard's
Archive for future reference. :-)
